welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Burton Latimer, where historic architecture and friendly locals await. Take in the beauty of our town and discover its famous shoe-making heritage. Enjoy your stay and explore all that Burton Latimer has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Northampton Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo operations at Northampton Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Royal Air Force Alconbury Airport serves both civilian and military flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cottesmor RAF Airport serves both civilian and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Cottesmor RAF Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
